item.title: GSoC ChainerX: Linear Algebra
item.author: ivan.yashchuk@aalto.fi (Ivan Yashchuk)
item.description: Coding period start soon! This summer I am going to work on extending ChainerX with some Linear Algebra routines. The goal is to implement common routines that are described at numpy.linalg. And their sensitivities for reverse mode automatic differentiation has to implemented as well!
